subSections.title: Kanji
subSections.text: {{ja-kanji|grade=uc|rs=艸05|kyu=薴}}

subSections.title: Readings
Etymology 1
Pronunciation
subSections.text: {{ja-pron|yomi=k|お}}

subSections.title: Noun
subSections.text:
{{ja-noun|お|hhira=を}}

# [[hemp]] or [[ramie]]
# [[thread]] made from the outer [[husk]] of the [[stem]]s of [[hemp]] or [[ramie]]
# a [[textile]] made from this thread

subSections.title: Derived terms
subSections.text:
{{der-top}}
* {{ja-r|苧の実%油|おのみ%あぶら}}: oil from the [[hemp]] or [[ramie]] seed
* {{ja-r|苧%引き|お%ひき|rom=-}}, {{ja-r|苧%引|お%ひき}}: the [[process]] of [[pull]]ing the [[hemp]] or [[ramie]] [[fiber]]s from the [[husk]]
* {{ja-r|苧%屋|お%や}}: a [[shop]] or [[store]] selling [[ramie]]
* {{ja-r|桶|おけ}}: a [[tub]] or [[basin]]
* {{ja-r|苧%桶|お%おけ}}: a [[tub]] or [[basin]] in which the collected [[hemp]] or [[ramie]] [[fiber]]s are placed
{{der-bottom}}

subSections.title: Synonyms
Etymology 2
subSections.text:
{{ja-kanjitab|yomi=k|むし}}

From {{inh|ja|ojp|sort=むし|-}}. Possibly the original name for the plant, or for the fiber from this plant. Possibly also cognate with {{cog|ain|モセ|tr=mose}}, {{m|ain|ムセ|tr=muse||[[nettle]] plant; [[bast]] [[fiber]] in general}}

subSections.title: Pronunciation
subSections.text: {{ja-pron|yomi=k|むし}}

subSections.title: Alternative forms
subSections.text: * {{ja-l|枲}} {{qualifier|rare}}, {{ja-l|帔}} {{qualifier|rare}}

subSections.title: Noun
Etymology 3
Pronunciation
subSections.text: {{ja-pron|yomi=k|からむし|acc=2|acc_ref=DJR,NHK|acc2=0|acc2_ref=DJR,NHK}}

subSections.title: Alternative forms
subSections.text: * {{ja-l|苧麻}}, {{ja-l|紵}} {{qualifier|rare}}, {{ja-l|枲}} {{qualifier|rare}}, {{ja-l|葈}} {{qualifier|rare}}

subSections.title: Noun
subSections.text:
{{ja-noun|からむし}}

# the [[ramie]] plant, {{taxlink|Boehmeria nivea|species|noshow=1}} or {{taxlink|Boehmeria nipononivea|species|noshow=1}}
# a [[thread]] made from the [[fiber]]s of this plant
# a [[textile]] made from this thread
#*: circa '''800''', ''Shibunritsu Ongi'' (page 47)<ref name="shibunritsu">
{{cite-book
|last=Tsukishima
|first=Hiroshi
|title=Kojisho Ongi Shūsei 2: Shibunritsu Ongi
|publisher=Kyūko Shoin
|year_published=1979
|page=47
|year=circa 800
|location=Tōkyō
|lang=ja
|isbn=4-7629-3089-X
}}</ref>
#*: 蒭麻衣 '''加良牟斯'''衣

subSections.title: Derived terms
subSections.text: * {{ja-r|苧%頭%巾|からむし% ず%きん}}: a {{m|ja|頭巾|tr=zukin||headcloth, bandana}} made from [[ramie]]

subSections.title: Etymology 4
Pronunciation
subSections.text: {{ja-pron|yomi=k|からんし}}

subSections.title: Noun
subSections.text:
{{ja-noun|からんし}}

# {{lb|ja|sort=からんし|rare|obsolete}} the [[ramie]] plant
# {{lb|ja|sort=からんし|rare|obsolete}} a [[thread]] made from the [[fiber]]s of this plant
# {{lb|ja|sort=からんし|rare|obsolete}} a [[textile]] made from this thread

subSections.title: Etymology 5
Pronunciation
subSections.text: {{ja-pron|yomi=k|こるむし}}

subSections.title: Noun
subSections.text:
{{ja-noun|こるむし}}

# {{lb|ja|sort=こるむし|rare|obsolete}} the [[ramie]] plant
# {{lb|ja|sort=こるむし|rare|obsolete}} a [[thread]] made from the [[fiber]]s of this plant
# {{lb|ja|sort=こるむし|rare|obsolete}} a [[textile]] made from this thread
#* circa '''800''', ''Shibunritsu Ongi'' (page 47)<ref name="shibunritsu"/>
#*: 纎麻衣 '''古流牟斯'''衣

subSections.title: Etymology 6
subSections.text:
{{ja-kanjitab|yomi=kanyo|ま}}

From {{der|ja|ltc|sort=ま|-}} {{ltc-l|薴}}, but read with the [[音読み#Japanese|''on'yomi'']] from {{m|ja|麻|tr=ma||hemp}}. Compare modern {{cog|cmn|苧|tr=zhù}}, {{m|cmn|麻|tr=má}}.

subSections.title: Pronunciation
subSections.text: {{ja-pron|yomi=kanyo|ま}}

subSections.title: Affix
subSections.text:
{{ja-pos|affix|ま}}

# the [[ramie]] or [[hemp]] plant or fiber

subSections.title: Derived terms
Etymology 7
subSections.text:
{{ja-kanjitab|yomi=o|ちょ}}

From {{der|ja|ltc|sort=ちょ|-}} {{ltc-l|薴}}. Compare modern {{cog|cmn|苧|tr=zhù}}.

subSections.title: Pronunciation
subSections.text: {{ja-pron|yomi=kanon|ちょ}}

subSections.title: Affix
subSections.text:
{{ja-pos|affix|ちょ}}

# the [[ramie]] or [[hemp]] plant or fiber
